Create a shopping cart that can sense when you're running low on items and automatically reorder them for you.
Design a shopping cart that uses AI to suggest complementary products based on your previous purchases and browsing history.
Develop a shopping cart that allows you to scan barcodes directly from your phone and add them to your cart without having to search for them online.
Create a shopping cart that uses biometric authentication to ensure only authorized users can access their account and make purchases.
Design a shopping cart that integrates with popular smart home devices, such as Amazon Alexa or Google Home, allowing customers to control their shopping list and order items hands-free.
